LANEACTION.COMMENT: Setup the cargo for tender and count type
Setup the cargo for Carge and count type
Check to see if there are tenders which have not been counted.

ARRIVE.COMMENT: Determine from the Cargo where to start -- cash detail count, cash summary count, or complete till count.

AISLE.name: ApprovedCheckDetail
AISLE.COMMENT: Expected and Entered are not equal. User Approved difference

ROAD.name: RetryCheckDetail
ROAD.COMMENT: Expected and Entered are not equal. User wants to re-enter

AISLE.name: AcceptTenderDetailDiscrepency
AISLE.COMMENT: A discrepency between Entered and Expected has been found and the user has accepted it.

ROAD.name: DoNotAcceptTenderDetailDescrepency
ROAD.COMMENT: A descrepency between Entered and Expected has been found and the user did not accept it.

AISLE.name: ChargeButtonPressed
AISLE.COMMENT: This aisle is traveled the user has selected a tender.

ROAD.name: NotTillCountRoad
ROAD.COMMENT: If we aren't couting the till, we are finished.

AISLE.name: AcceptForeignTenderDetailDescrepency
AISLE.COMMENT: A descrepency between Entered and Expected has been found and the user has accepted it.

ROAD.name: DoNotAcceptForeignTenderDetailDiscrepency
ROAD.COMMENT: A descrepency between Entered and Expected has been found and the user did not accept it.
